title: Age of Conan Waypoints - FIXED+WORKING
description:
FIXED AND WORKING VERSION OF THE OLD :

This is the install file, and the files itself (the install .bat file only copies all the files automatically ;P) for Age of Conan - Hyborian Adventures resource Waypoints.

To install:

1. Read the "Read Me"

2. Deside whether to copy the files yourself (go to step 3.2.) or run the .bat file (go to step 3.1.)

3.1. Run the .bat file and restart the game. 

OR

3.2. Copy the files in the Waypoints folder to the directory soecified in the ReadMe file.   

4. Restart the game.  *DONE*



The paths for the Waypoints folders are: 

XP: 
C:Documents and Settings<username>Local SettingsApplication DataFuncomConanPrefs<funcom-login>Waypoints
	

VISTA: 
C:Users<username>AppDataLocalFuncom ConanPrefs<funcom-login>Waypoints 


*Where <username> (Without the &#039;< >&#039;) is your Windows logon name (for instance your real life name or whatever) and where <funcom-login> (Without the &#039;< >&#039;) is your AoC login name.*


Happy gathering! 





Please note: This is not my work, and all corrections, and adds should go to the official Age of Conan Crafting forums.
